item.title: Slayer Monsters With No Requirements
item.dc:creator: @josh1993nhs josh1993nhs
item.description:
@josh1993nhs wrote:

Alright theyre still attackable with one slayer, and there were no errors, this is what i have now. But what confuses me is that jellies require slayer and the code is the same, just different id’s.

	if (type == 1615) {
		if (playerLevel[18] >= 85) {
			sM("You must be level 85 slayer or higher to attack this monster.");
					break;
		}
	}
	if (type == 2783) {
		if (playerLevel[18] >= 90) {
			sM("You must be level 90 slayer or higher to attack this monster.");
					break;
		}
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Monsters With No Requirements
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Your using the wrong operator.

Read this to yourself:

if (playerLevel[18] <= 70) {

if the player’s level, 18, which is slayer, is less than or equal to 70, allow them to do this.

You want greater than or equal to, not less than. >=

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Monsters With No Requirements
item.dc:creator: @josh1993nhs josh1993nhs
item.description:
@josh1993nhs wrote:

if (type == 1613) {
if (playerLevel[18] <= 70) {
sM(“You must be level 70 slayer or higher to attack this monster.”);
break;
}
}
if (type == 1615) {
if (playerLevel[18] <= 85) {
sM(“You must be level 85 slayer or higher to attack this monster.”);
break;
}
}
if (type == 2783) {
if (playerLevel[18] <= 90) {
sM(“You must be level 90 slayer or higher to attack this monster.”);
break;
}
}

Thats what it currently is now(The npc 1613 works with the correct requirement, and the code on them is the same, but abby demons+dark beasts wont let me add requirements, also im editing these in the client.java)

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Monsters With No Requirements
item.dc:creator: @josh1993nhs josh1993nhs
item.description:
@josh1993nhs wrote:

The Problem : My slayer monstors dont have any level requirements, but in my client.java it shows it as requiring the slayer level. For example, i can attack abyssal demons with one slayer, and in the client.java i have this -

if (type == 1615) {
if (playerLevel[18] < 85) {
sM(“You must be level 85 slayer or higher to attack this monster.”);
break;
}
}

The same is for dark beasts and the other slayer npc’s but they are attackable, and have no slayer requirements.

Read full topic
